creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John M. and Janet B. McKelvey
description: Round canteen body with white ground; spout at the center top of body painted with pigment outline with black pigment; to each side of the spout are two rounded handles; on the body of the canteen are eight red pigmented frogs with white stripes on the faces and black dots throughout the bodies; the backside of the canteen is signed by artist and has 3 felt feet glued;
markings: Signed on backside; Agnes Peynetsa; Copyright 2001;  Zuni, NM
title: Frog canteen
